resources.string:
Introducing "Purple Glasses" - the epitome of style and functionality fused into one exquisite eyewear piece. Crafted with precision and flair, these spectacles redefine elegance with their sleek purple frames that exude sophistication.

Designed for those who crave both fashion and utility, Purple Glasses boast not only a striking appearance but also unparalleled comfort. The lightweight construction ensures all-day wear without sacrificing durability, while the ergonomic design guarantees a snug fit for every face shape.

Enhancing your vision with clarity and precision, these glasses feature high-quality lenses that provide optimal protection against harmful UV rays. Whether you're strolling through the city streets or embarking on outdoor adventures, Purple Glasses offer unparalleled visual acuity, ensuring every moment is enjoyed with utmost clarity.
Fashion-forward yet timeless, Purple Glasses seamlessly complement any ensemble, from casual chic to formal elegance. Elevate your look and embrace unparalleled style with Purple Glasses - where fashion meets function in perfect harmony.

Frame Color : Purple 
Frame Material : Lightweight and durable polymer 
Lens Material : High-quality optical plastic Lens Type : UV protection 
Lens Coating : Anti-scratch 
Fit: Universal fit, suitable for various face shapes 
Design : Sleek and ergonomic design for comfort and style 
Usage : Suitable for everyday wear, indoor and outdoor activities
Dimensions (approximate) :
- Frame Width: 140mm
- Lens Width: 50mm
- Lens Height: 40mm
- Temple Length: 140mm
